title: Girardi Family Values
description:
What do you get when you combine a prestigious attorney, Tom Girardi, and a Real Housewives of Beverly Hills star, Erika Jayne? A classic Hollywood tale of the wealthy elite living in luxury until salacious allegations of fraud, embezzlement and contentious divorce proceedings come to light and shred the fairy tale to pieces.

*Show notes/corrections: Erika purportedly spent upwards of $40k/month, not $40k/day on her glam squad.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
